achievements.title: Foundational Knowledge
achievements.description: Very strong knowledge of networking fundamentals, with foundational expertise across Windows & Linux systems, cloud platforms like Azure, programming (Python, C#), and web development. This broad skillset, including configuring servers like Apache, is built on extensive training, including the CompTIA curriculum.

achievements.title: Driven by Curiosity
achievements.description: I'm constantly exploring new tools and methodologies to find smarter, more efficient ways to solve complex problems and stay ahead of the curve.

skillDefinitions.Python: A versatile, high-level programming language used for web development, data science, and automation.
skillDefinitions.C#: A modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft for building Windows applications and web services.
skillDefinitions.Linux: An open-source operating system kernel, widely used for servers, cloud computing, and embedded systems.
skillDefinitions.Windows: A family of operating systems developed by Microsoft, common in enterprise environments.
skillDefinitions.Azure: Microsoft's cloud computing platform, offering a wide range of services for computing, analytics, storage, and networking.
skillDefinitions.Networking: The practice of designing, building, and maintaining computer networks to enable communication and data sharing.
skillDefinitions.Apache: A widely-used, open-source web server software that plays a key role in the initial growth of the World Wide Web.
skillDefinitions.Docker: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers, ensuring consistency across environments.
skillDefinitions.Kubernetes: An open-source container orchestration system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
skillDefinitions.Terraform: An infrastructure as code (IaC) tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently.
skillDefinitions.Ansible: An open-source automation tool for configuration management, application deployment, and task automation.
skillDefinitions.CI/CD: Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery/Deployment: a practice of automating software development and release processes.
skillDefinitions.Git: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.
skillDefinitions.Bash: A command-line interpreter and scripting language for controlling Unix-like operating systems.
skillDefinitions.Prometheus: An open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit originally built at SoundCloud.
skillDefinitions.Grafana: An open-source platform for monitoring and observability, allowing you to query, visualize, and alert on metrics.
skillDefinitions.Security: The practice of protecting computer systems and networks from theft, damage, or unauthorized access.
